items.name: Component_AnimationHandler
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_AnimationHandler
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_AnimationHandler extends ui.Component_Handler
    ###*
    * An animation-handler component allows a UI game object to execute
    * a flow of animations. For more information about UI animations, see help-file.
    * 
    * @module ui
    * @class Component_AnimationHandler
    * @extends ui.Component_Handler
    * @memberof ui
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * @property initialized
        * @type boolean
        * @protected
        ###
        @initialized = no
        
        ###*
        * @property waitCounter
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @waitCounter = 0
        
        ###*
        * @property pointer
        * @type number
        * @protected
        ###
        @pointer = 0
        
    ###*
    * Initializes the animation-handler.
    * 
    * @method setup
    ###
    setup: ->
        @initialized = yes
   
        return null
    
    ###*
    * Processes the animation targets and starts the animation on each
    * target object if possible.
    * 
    * @method processTargets
    * @param {Object} animation - The animation to start.
    * @param {gs.Object_Base[]} targets - An array of target objects.
    * @protected
    ### 
    processTargets: (animation, targets) ->
        for target in targets
            if animation.type?
                target.visible = yes
                if !animation.components? then animation.components = []
                
                if(!@object.animator)
                    @object.animator = new gs.Component_Animator()
                    @object.addComponent(@object.animator)

                animation.components.push(@object.animationExecutor.startAnimation(animation, animation.duration, target, @object.animator))

                target.visible = yes
                animation.executed = !(animation.repeat ? yes)
            else
                animation.executed = !(animation.repeat ? yes)
    
        return null
        
    ###*
    * Clears/Resets the specified animation if necessary.
    * 
    * @method clear
    * @param {Object} descriptor - The animation descriptor
    * @protected
    ###             
    clear: (descriptor) ->
        descriptor.cleared = yes
        descriptor.pointer = 0
        descriptor.waitCounter = 0
        for animation in descriptor.flow
            if animation.components
                for component in animation.components
                    #component?.dispose()
                    target = @object
                    target.visible = yes
                    animation.executed = no
                    if animation.field? and animation.reset?
                        ui.BindingHandler.resolveFieldPath(target, animation.field).set(target, ui.BindingHandler.fieldValue(target, animation.reset || 0))
                animation.components = []  
                
        @object.needsFullUpdate = yes
        
        return null
    
    ###*
    * Processes the animation flow.
    * 
    * @method processAnimations
    * @param {Object} descriptor - The animation-descriptor containing the animation-flow.
    * @protected
    ### 
    processAnimations: (descriptor) ->
        while descriptor.pointer < descriptor.flow.length
            animation = descriptor.flow[descriptor.pointer]
            descriptor.pointer++
            
            if !animation.wait and animation.executed then continue
            
            targets = if animation.target? then ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(@object, animation.target) else @object
            targets = if targets.length? then targets else [targets]
            descriptor.cleared = no
            
            @processTargets(animation, targets)
            
            if animation.wait
                if animation.type?
                    descriptor.waitCounter = animation.duration
                else
                    descriptor.waitCounter = animation.wait #ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(@object, animation.wait || 0, yes)
                break
                
        return null
                
    ###*
    * Updates the animations.
    * 
    * @method updateAnimations
    ###
    updateAnimations: ->
        for descriptor, i in @object.animations
            if @checkObject(descriptor)
                if descriptor.waitCounter > 0
                    descriptor.waitCounter--
                    continue
                
                if (not descriptor.pointer?) or descriptor.pointer >= descriptor.flow.length
                    descriptor.pointer = 0
                    
                @processAnimations(descriptor)
            else if !descriptor.cleared and (descriptor.clear ? yes)
                @clear(descriptor)
                
        return null
     
    ###*
    * Updates the animation-handler.
    * 
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        @object.needsUpdate = yes
        @updateAnimations()
        
        
        
        
ui.Component_AnimationHandler = Component_AnimationHandler
